rules_text:
Foreshadow 3–{1}{R} [i](If you cast this spell for its foreshadow cost, it enters with three time counters on it. Until the last is removed, it's an artifact and not a creature. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter from it.)[/i]
When Nachtwood Heartseeker enters the battlefield, it deals 2 damage to any target.
